alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 01 at 11:45AM PST until January 02 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter to one half mile in dense fog. The visibility has improved in many areas this afternoon but will return to dense fog tonight. * WHERE...In Oregon, Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon and North Central Oregon. In Washington, Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington. * WHEN...Until noon PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Blue Mountains of Washington
